I looked back at the release notes, and there was a bug in Radiance 3.1 
(released Jan 2002) that caused the -pa option to fail in rpiece.  
Could this be your problem?  I just assumed you were using the latest 
version.  If there is such ann error in the 3.5 official release, this 
is the first I've heard about it.


-Greg
